room_quality.comm: The rooms are described as generally spacious and clean, though there are some mentions of small showers and bed size issues.

cont.itemA: The room was big, clean and had all that we were looking for, but the shower place is tiny.
cont.itemB: The room was very comfortable and even enjoyed the jacuzzi shower once we worked out how to use it!

cleanliness.comm: The rooms were reported to be clean.

cont.itemA: The rooms were very clean but the shower was incredibly small.
cont.itemB: The rooms were roomy and beyond clean.

staff_service.comm: The staff are friendly and helpful.

cont.itemA: Many, many thanks to the delightful family and staff of Hotel Apollo.
cont.itemB: The staff were very friendly and helpful.

location.comm: The hotel is centrally located, allowing easy access to major attractions and public transport.

cont.itemA: Located in centro storico Roma within view of the mighty Roman coloseum.
cont.itemB: The location is excellent, 5 mins away from the Termini and the Colosseum.

itemA.price: No specific details about price were discussed in this review.
itemA.dining: A tasty buffet breakfast is served each morning in the rooftop terrace dining room.

itemB.price: Other comparable hotels were more expensive, so this was a very good value.
itemB.dining: Breakfast was excellent, the best we had during our 12-day travels throughout Italy.
